channel.title: And not a single effort was given that day
channel.description:
[img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/4017/bluesward1.png[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/9642/bluesward2.png[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/4690/cinematicrender1.png[/img] Yeah I know I'm back againone might say, pulling an "h1". But I have reason. Apparently, I'm suffering from some sort of depression that makes me feel useless and unneeded, on and off. This has caused me to do a lot of things I probably didn't want, but I'll try and talk myself out of quitting anything from now on.
On with the model, the poly count is just so ungodly overkilled that if I showed you, you would quite possibly develop testicular cancer, regardless of gender. After 5 useful suggestions on improvement I'll post a new picture (rather than every single suggestion.)
Oh, and I didn't use nurbs. [hr] Update 1: Changed the colors from bronze and a dim gold to a cyan-like blue. More Angles, and a cinematic type render.

And glad to see you back.

and I meant just the way it looks, it is too choppy but you don’t know what is in that temple of his o.o

item.title: And not a single effort was given that day
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:




Yeah I know I’m back againone might say, pulling an “h1”.
But I have reason. Apparently, I’m suffering from some sort of depression that makes me feel useless and unneeded, on and off. This has caused me to do a lot of things I probably didn’t want, but I’ll try and talk myself out of quitting anything from now on.

On with the model, the poly count is just so ungodly overkilled that if I showed you, you would quite possibly develop testicular cancer, regardless of gender.
After 5 useful suggestions on improvement I’ll post a new picture (rather than every single suggestion.)

Oh, and I didn’t use nurbs.
[hr]
Update 1: Changed the colors from bronze and a dim gold to a cyan-like blue. More Angles, and a cinematic type render.

Read full topic
